perturbation.explanation: By reducing the lookback period for bankruptcy disclosures from ten years to five years, the modified text may violate the disclosure requirements under the Federal Trade Commission's (FTC) Franchise Rule, which generally requires a ten-year lookback period for disclosing material information related to bankruptcy.
